title: What to Do Before Your Book Launch: For Traditionally Published Books
description: What To Do Before Your Book Launch is a guide for authors, covering everything from working with your publisher, to reading in public, to help for publicity and marketing, to using (and misusing) social media, to how to dress for your author photoâ€¦and far more, including cautionary tales, worksheets, timelines and etiquette tips.
author: M.J. Rose
